class.name: omnibot/OmnibotSystemHardware
class.description: The ros2_control Omnibot driver using a system hardware interface-type. It uses velocity command and position state interface. Adopted from example at: https://github.com/ros-controls/ros2_control_demos/tree/4c5bbb8184e09016f69391bdb3d6ade39717ebed/example_2
